com.clicksmob.sdk

Class OfferSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clicksmob.sdk.OfferSDK

  • public class OfferSDK
extends Object
    This is the main class of Clicksmob OfferSDK Java SDK

    Generally, it's used in the following manner: 

     AuthenticationObject auth = new AuthenticationObjectUserPassword(
          AuthenticationObjectUserPassword.URL_API_LOGIN_DEFAULT, userAccountName, userPassword );
 OfferSDK offers = new OfferSDK( OfferSDK.URL_API_SECURED_DEFAULT );
 // ... OR for token base authentication
 auth = new AuthenticationObjectToken( utoken, uid );
 offers = new OfferSDK();
 offers.init( authUserPassword );
 int i = 0;
 for( Offers.Offer offer : offers.getAllOffers().getOffer() )
 {
    System.out.print( i++ );
    System.out.print( ") " );
    System.out.println( offer.getOfferName() );
    for( CountryPlatformSet countryPlatformSet : offer.getOfferCaps().getCountryPlatformSet() )
    {
       System.out.println( "\t Daily offer restrictions: " + countryPlatformSet.getDailyCap() );
       System.out.println( "\t\t Countries" );
       for( CountryCode cc : countryPlatformSet.getCountries().getCountry() )
       {
          System.out.println( "\t\t\t  " + cc );
       }
       System.out.println( "\t\t Platforms" );
       for( PlatformCode pc : countryPlatformSet.getPlatforms().getPlatform() )
       {
          System.out.println( "\t\t\t  " + pc );
       }
    }
    for( OfferPayout offerPayout : offer.getOfferPayouts().getOfferPayout() )
    {
       System.out.println( "\t Offer payout: " + offerPayout.getPayout() );
       System.out.println( "\t\t Countries" );
       for( CountryCode cc : offerPayout.getCountries().getCountry() )
       {
          System.out.println( "\t\t\t  " + cc );
       }
       System.out.println( "\t\t Platforms" );
       for( PlatformCode pc : offerPayout.getPlatforms().getPlatform() )
       {
          System.out.println( "\t\t\t  " + pc );
       }
    }
 }
    See Also:
    OfferSDK, OfferSDK#Offers(String), init(AuthenticationObject), getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries(Collection, Collection), getAllOffers()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllOffers

        public Offers getAllOffers()
        Gets all offers.
        Returns:
        all offers
        See Also:
        getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries(Collection, Collection)

      • getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries

        public Offers getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries(Collection<String> platforms,
                                       Collection<String> countries)
        Gets the offers for platforms and countries. For the empty list of platforms, all offers for any platform will be returned. For the empty list of countries, all offers for any country will be returned
        Parameters:
        platforms - the platforms
        countries - the countries
        Returns:
        the offers for platforms and countries
        See Also:
        getAllOffers()

      • init

        public void init(AuthenticationObject authObject)
          throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                 IOException,
                 ClicksmobException,
                 JAXBException
        Authenticate and init an instance of the com.clicksmob.sdk.OfferSDK with a newly created authentication object.
        Parameters:
        authObject - the auth object
        Throws:
        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException - the client protocol exception
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClicksmobException - the clicksmob exception
        JAXBException
        See Also:
        OfferSDK, AuthenticationObject
